comment: Easy! She gave me nice feedback on all of my work, very sweet. You have work due every Sunday but it's very easy, a quiz on Revel and your choice of 5/13 assignments for the semester. Not a tough grader at all, I got 100s on everything. Highly recommend!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: I had Professor Hayden for my Interpersonal Communications class. She's alright, but she could be passive-aggressive at times and isn't the best communicator. The quizzes are very short, so getting two questions wrong will give you a bad grade. You automatically get a zero on an assignment if you don't turn it in before the due date. Super strict.
